idea-plugin.name: Base16 Colors
idea-plugin.vendor: mrmrs (http://clrs.cc), Chris Kempson, and Shirom Makkad
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Colors for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by mrmrs (http://clrs.cc). Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
